dialogue.line: Okay, screw you, dude. Like, ACTUALLY screw you.
Don't you know who I am? You think you can just come out here, with your stupid beep-boop voice, and your hot girlfriend...
And make me look bad? ON MY OWN FREAKIN' STAGE?? REALLY??
Alright V-man, I think we gotta get these two outta here, I-
HEY! I don't NOT-PAY you two to call the shots around here!
You don't not-pay us at all-
Enough. You think you're special, punk?
I'm A.C. Void. A-C-FREAKIN' VOID. And you're nothing but a tiny speck in the universe. A NOBODY.
Trust me pal, you are NOT making it out of this. I'm bout' to send you into another DIMENSION.
